root.codeCell: -- Main.graph -- outer block is the main graph block -- each inner block runs async in a coroutine do do -- wait for the level selection scene to load WaitFor(Scenes.LevelSelection.Events.Loaded) end do -- load the unity asset async Addressables.LoadAsset("Assets/Demos/Retro/RetroClouds.unity") end do -- enable the button Scenes.LevelSelection.Buttons.RetroClouds.Enable() end end
